channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Social Sharing
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Social Sharing

item.title: CVE-2022-4198|2024-08-03T01:34:49.637Z -- unknown -- wp%20social%20sharing
item.description: The WP Social Sharing WordPress plugin through 2.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
